greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = largest natural number x such that x=n+A034968(x), or zero if no such number exists.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10079
program: (define (A230424 n) (if (zero? n) 1 (let ((v (A230423 n))) (if (zero? v) v (+ 1 v)))))
xref: One more than A230423 at its nonzero points. A219658 gives the positions of zeros. Can be used to compute A230425-A230427.
Analogous sequence for binary system: A213724.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 31 2013
